titles.title: Compassionate Retirement Act of 2019
Compassionate Retirement Act of 2019
Kathryn Manginelli Act of 2019
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to establish an exception to the penalty on early distributions from qualified plans for individuals diagnosed with certain terminal illnesses.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Kathryn Manginelli Act of 2019 or the Compassionate Retirement Act of 2019
This bill permits early distributions, without penalty, from tax-preferred pension plans to individuals diagnosed with a terminal illness (i.e., an illness or physical condition that can be reasonably expected to result in death seven years after diagnosis).
